title: Trimming, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: supplementary warp pile in a plain weave foundation
description: Yellow and pink trimming fragment in a design of a central band showing squares alternately in pink velvet and pink plain weave with yellow borders and picot edges.

Trimming, 19th century. Medium: silk
